name: Grattan After School Program (GASP)
description: By working closely with the Grattan Elementary School staff, GASP seeks to help students be more successful in school and life as they grow and move on from elementary school.
fullDescription: By working closely with the Grattan Elementary School staff, GASP seeks to help students be more successful in school and life as they grow and move on from elementary school.
whatTheyOffer: GASP (Grattan After School Program) Mission Statement- GASP provides an inclusive and joyful afterschool program where everyone from Grattan Elementary is welcome. GASP builds community and provides interest based enrichment and recreation, as well as academic opportunities each day. We support students in their academic, physical, social and emotional development. We are an inclusive program that supports the Grattan community. We strive to serve every student at Grattan Elementary School that
